Services
What's in your pipeline?

Do you need more products or help with pipeline prioritisation?

Gained from key positions in product ideation, pipeline generation and project management at Unnayati we have developed an instinct for identifying product opportunities that are low-cost, low-risk and strategically-aligned.

Using bespoke data mining solutions, our informatics team can also help you find new disease areas for your drugs.
There are many strategies to extend the life of your product. These range from reformulation and chiral switching to simple chemical modification.

Have you captured possible new uses for your products?

Unnayati can provide advice on line extension and set up brainstorming sessions to map out a new life for your products.
Benefit from Unnayati's extensive preclinical project management experience gained from leading many projects through preclinical testing and leading two products into the clinic.

Operating successfully under ‘virtual’ business models means having proficiency with out-sourcing.

Unnayati can help you to identify and manage relationships with service providers and academic groups.

Additionally, we can help you access expert opinion and know-how for difficult to source models.
Are there opportunities for your product to enter specialist niche markets needing fewer and smaller trials?

Orphan designation offers a variety of incentives including extended market exclusivity, clinical trial advice and research grants.

Orphan designation can secure these incentives in the absence of IP.

Unnayati has experience with preparing and submitting successful orphan applications to both EU and US regulators.
